addHostAdresses

public static void addHostAdresses()
Adds a list of the connected networks, useful to create a local rendezvous list. Using the stored protocol and port.

port - the port, that is used

getAll

public static java.lang.String getAll()
Return the rendezvous list from the rendezvous list file

Returns:
Return a rendezvous list, or if no rendezvous list file exists, return ""

find

public static int find(java.lang.String rendezvous)
Search a rendezvous in the rendezvousList and give back the line

Parameters:
rendezvous - the rendezvous you seaching for
Returns:
the line, if it wasn't found, -1 will be returned

delete

public static boolean delete(int line)
Delete a rendezvous in the given line

Parameters:
line - the line of the rendezvous to delete
Returns:
returns true, if the rendezvous was deleted, else it will returns false
